recipe_name: Corn skewers with chilli herb drizzle
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: For the corn skewers, place the corn-on-the-cob into a small bowl, sprinkle with water and microwave on high for six minutes. Cut into 2cm/1in pieces using a large, sharp knife. Thread the corn pieces onto skewers, drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat a griddle pan until hot and griddle the corn skewers until golden-brown on all sides. For the chilli herb drizzle, mix all the ingredients together in a small bowl. To serve, place the corn skewers onto a serving plate and pour over the chilli herb drizzle. Garnish with lime wedges.
